lines.gurmukhi: gwNfw mY imTwsu qws iClkw n lIE jwie dwrm Aau dwK ibKY bIju gih fwrIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Gaandaa Mai Mitthaasu Taas Chhilakaa N Leeao Jaai , Daaram Au Daakh Bikhai Beeju Gahi Daareeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As the sweet juice of the sugarcane is taken and the cane is discarded; as the seeds in pomegranate and grapes are discarded;

lines.gurmukhi: AwNb iKrnI Chwrw mwJ guTlI kTor KrbUjw Aau klIdw sjl ibkwrIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Aanb Khiranee Chhahaaraa Maajh Goutthalee Katthora , Kharaboojaa Au Kaleedaa Sajal Bikaareeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Mango, dates have their endocarps hard; melon and watermelons though sweet release water and become unworthy of consumption very soon;

lines.gurmukhi: mDu mwKI mY mlIn smY pwie sPl huie rs bs Bey nhI qiRsnw invwrIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Madhu Maakhee Mai Maleen Samai Paai Sadhal Hui , Ras Bas Bhaay Nahee Trisanaa Nivaareeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The honey when cleaned of the bees and the wax become hard to give up eating it;

lines.gurmukhi: sRI gur sbd rs AMmiRq inDwn pwn gurisK swDsMig jnmu svwrIAY ]109]
lines.transliteration_english: Sree Gur Sabad Ras Anmrit Nidhaan Paana , Gursikh Saadhasangi Janamu Savaareeai ?109?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly a Sikh of the Guru, relishes the elixir-like Naam in the company of holy men and makes his life a success. (109)
